title: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Social Renting Demand
description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Social Renting Demand..
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 3 Tables - Social Renting Demand" under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: 12 tables with different aspects.  needs some up front work to determine how to handle the dimensions / split into datasets.  Should be straightforward to extract data
